title: Anne's fabulous BBQ salmon
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon grated fresh root ginger', '2 tablespoons honey', '5 tablespoons chopped fresh basil leaves', '1 tablespoon finely chopped shallots', '1 (1.25) salmon fillet, with skin']
